cast.name: 阿曼达·科德纳 Amanda Cordner
格蕾丝·林恩·孔 Grace Lynn Kung

introduction: Season 2 of award-winning series SORT OF is the season of love. Love includes your friends, family, work, romantic love and, most importantly, one’s self-love. Sabi decides that not only are they ready for some uncomplicated romance but they also want everyone to love each other. Unfortunately, Sabi is faced with situations and relationships that are anything but simple, including their dad’s unexpected return from Dubai, the Kaneko-Bauers’ struggles as Bessy is released from rehab and issues at Bar Bük.Baig and Fab Filippo serve as creators, executive producers and co-showrunners, with Jennifer Kawaja as executive producer alongside Bruno Dubé. SORT OF is produced with the participation of the Canada Media Fund.
